name: 賀一平
objective: 本課程設計重點有三：(1)藉由精選的中級程度教材加強學生必備的基礎文法觀念和句型結構；(2)使學生確切把握閱讀要領以及充分瞭解寫作的各種技巧，重心在生字、片語、句法的解釋和基本寫作技巧的分析；(3)透過練習加強聽、說、讀、寫的知能及表達。
schedule:
Week               Topic
1                  Introduction
2                  Zodiac signs
3                  Zodiac signs
4                  Sex for sale
5                  Torture
6                  Children who kill
7                  Sexual harassment
8                  Mid-term Exam & General Exam
9                  Gays and jobs
10                 Gay families
11                 Marriage--for better or for worse
12                 Abortion
13                 Are you happy with your body?
14                 The right to die
15                 Legalizing drugs
16                 The death penalty
17                 Final Exam
18                 General Exam
scorePolicy:
General Exams        30%
Final Exam and Mid-term Exam       40%
Quizzes and Oral Presentations and Participation     30%
materials: MacAndrew, R., & Martinez, R. (2002).  Taboos and issues.  Boston, MA: Thomson.
